mapper.select: SELECT n_num, n_author, n_title, TO_CHAR(n_writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS n_writedate FROM notice ORDER BY n_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(n_num, ad_num, n_title, n_content, n_author, n_important) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, 1, #{n_title}, #{n_content}, '${n_author}', #{n_important})
